SRCCON 2019 • July 11 & 12 in MPLS Support the SRCCON team

Slackbot Transcript Alerts

We’re excited to be offering live transcription at SRCCON again this year. About half of our 2018 sessions will be transcribed (they’re all marked on the schedule), and we hope people feel able to take part even if they can’t join us in Minneapolis.

We’ll let you know on Twitter when a transcribed session is about to start, but you can also get alerts sent right into your team’s Slack. Add the “SRCCON Transcript Alerts” bot, and you’ll get a reminder and a link to the live transcript as these sessions get ready to begin.

Note: If you added this Slackbot for last year’s SRCCON, you will need to auth it again for SRCCON 2018.

The "Add to Slack" button will ask you to authorize access for a team you belong to, and choose a channel to receive the alerts. That's it!

About SRCCON events

OpenNews runs several journalism events each year. The largest is SRCCON, a mid-year conference for about 300 developers, designers, and data analysts. We also gather small working groups and convenings, and topically focused SRCCON-style events.
